item.title: Janelle Monáe announces new album ‘The Age of Pleasure’ out July 9th.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
BTS to release their own book on July 9th.
The 544-page book titled ‘Beyond The Story: 10-Year Record of BTS’ is written by journalist Myeongseok Kang and members of the group.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:

item.title: Elon Musk announces he has hired a female CEO for Twitter.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: E. Jean Carroll tells The New York Times that she’s been “insulted by better people” as she contemplates a third lawsuit against Trump.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
E. Jean Carroll is considering suing Donald Trump for a third time following his ‘vile’ comments about her on CNN.
Just this week, she was awarded $5 million in damages after Trump was found liable for sexually abusing and defaming her.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Taylor Swift once again earns the biggest streaming day for any artist on Spotify this year. (79.1m)
item.author: PopBase
